item.title: BeyondTrust Privilege Management Reporting in BeyondInsight
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link BeyondTrust Statement on log4j2 CVE-2021-44228 (Log4Shell) https://beyondtrustcorp.service-now.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB0016542 Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Until a patch is available, BeyondTrust recommends ensuring access to the instance is restricted and monitoring for anomalous behavior. There is no known exploit path at this time. CISAGov Last Update: 2021-12-15 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 0:42:42 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.
